alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Marion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 6:42PM EDT until July 16 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hancock County in central Indiana... Northeastern Marion County in central Indiana... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 642 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lawrence, or 8 miles northeast of Indianapolis, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Geist Reservoir around 645 PM EDT. Lawrence and McCordsville around 650 PM EDT. Cumberland around 655 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Spring Lake and Greenfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 between mile markers 200 and 202. Interstate 70 between mile markers 90 and 103. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
